name: UpdateRumMetric
description:
Update a specific rum-based metric in your organization.

Use this tool to update details of a specific rum-based metric within your organization's Datadog settings. Ideal for modifying existing metrics to adjust configurations.

parameters.name: metric_name
parameters.description: The name of the rum-based metric to be updated.

value_schema.description: The name of the rum-based metric.

parameters.name: new_rum_metric_definition
parameters.description: JSON object containing the new definition of the rum-based metric, including compute rules, filters, and other properties.

include_percentiles.description:
Toggle to include or exclude percentile aggregations for distribution metrics.
Only present when `aggregation_type` is `distribution`.

compute.description: The compute rule to compute the rum-based metric.

query.description: The search query - following the RUM search syntax.

filter.description: The rum-based metric filter. Events matching this filter will be aggregated in this metric.

path.description: The path to the value the rum-based metric will be aggregated over.

tag_name.description: Eventual name of the tag that gets created. By default, `path` is used as the tag name.

group_by.description: The rules for the group by.

attributes.description: The rum-based metric properties that will be updated.

id.description: The name of the rum-based metric.

type.description: The type of the resource. The value should always be rum_metrics.

value_schema.description: New definition of the rum-based metric.
